message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to make a deal. My initial offer is $950000 for the product. I'm confident that you'll find it a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $850000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a good deal, but I have to consider my own value of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my target. My counteroffer is $900000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $860000 for the product. Can we meet at this price?

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm still not at a price that I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target. My counteroffer is $885000 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $870000 for the product. Can we meet at this price?

I'm starting to feel that we're getting close, Bob. However, I still need to make a decent profit on this deal. I'm willing to meet you at $880000, but that's as low as I can go. I'm not comfortable going any lower than that.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $880000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $860000 for the product. Can we meet at this price?

Bob, I'm starting to feel that we're getting a bit stuck. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to be clear that this is my final offer. I'm willing to meet you at $875000, but that's it. If you're not comfortable with that, I'll have to consider other options.

I appreciate your willingness to make one last concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $860000 for the product. I'm not willing to go any higher. If you're not comfortable with this price, I'll have to consider other options, including buying from John for $800000.
